A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Even though the storyline of The Last Jedi is intriguing\, the movie fell flat. Finn's character devoplment went backwards when compared to The Force Awakens. Rose\, who I assume is supposed to be a strong\, independent woman\, was poorly written due to the cliche of her sacrificing \"for the things [she] loves.\" The chemistry between the two characters and the plot in which they were written (especially that of the Casino scene) is why this movie horrible failed for the audience.
